works.movement: Introduction: "Turtledove who flew aloft" Act I (duet)
Trio: "When these lawyers don't deliver" Act I (Rosalinda, Eisenstein and Dr. Blind)
Trio: "To part is such sweet sorrow" Act I (Rosalinda, Adele and Eisenstein)
Drinking song: "Drink, my darling...Good sir, are you accusing me...No, no, you set my doubts " Act I (Rosalinda, Alfred and Frank)
Entr'acte and Chorus: "What a joy to be here" Act II (Chorus)
"From time to time I entertain" Act II (Prince Orlofsky)
Ensemble: "My Friends, your kind attention!" Act II
Duet: "How engaging, how exciting" Act II (Rosalinda and Eisenstein)
Audition Song: "Ever since I was a baby" Act III (Adele)
Trio: "To judge his expression" Act III (Rosalinda, Alfred and Eisenstein)
Finale: "Oh, Eisenstein, you master-mind" Act III (ensemble)
